original_text: Joseph got all the extra food that grew in the seven good years. He stored it in Egypt's cities, near the fields where it had grown.
korean_text: 요셉이 애굽 땅에 있는 그 칠 년 곡물을 거두어 각 성에 저장하되 각 성읍 주위의 밭의 곡물을 그 성읍 중에 쌓아 두매

sentences.original_text: Joseph got all the extra food
that grew in the seven good years
He stored it in Egypt's cities
near the fields where it had grown
